definition: a very small spot, produce specks in or on
details:
noun
- a very small spot
= example: a very small spot
= synonyms: pinpoint
- a slight but appreciable amount
= synonyms: pinch
- (nontechnical usage) a tiny piece of anything
= synonyms: corpuscle, particle, atom, molecule, mote
verb
- produce specks in or on
= example: produce specks in or on
